                                 Stock stock)
        Description copied from interface: IOrder
        Updating the order with the ProductInOrder
        Specified by:
        manageCart in interface IOrder
        Parameters:
        p - the Product that need to be in the order
        price - the price of the product (maybe after sales and discounts)
        pio - the ProductInOrder to add to the cart with the new Product
        stock - the Stock with the sales data of the Product
        Returns:
        the ProductInOrder with the new data
